TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlTableCell extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 表示 对象中的 和 HTML 元素。

span.span: Represents the and HTML elements in an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ``元素表示表中的数据单元格时``元素表示表标题单元格。The `` element represents a data cell in a table, while the `` element represents a table heading cell. 使用类以编程方式控制``并``中的 HTML 元素对象。Use the class to programmatically control the `` and `` HTML elements in an object. 类使您可以通过指定背景色、 边框颜色、 高度和宽度自定义的表中的单元格的外观。The class allows you to customize the appearance of a cell in a table by specifying the background color, the border color, the height, and the width. 使用设置这些属性， ， ，和属性。These attributes are set using the , , , and properties. 您可以控制单元格的内容通过指定内容的垂直和水平对齐方式的显示方式。You can control how the content of a cell is displayed by specifying the vertical and horizontal alignment of the contents. 此外可以指定内容自动时是否继续到下一行的单元格的结束。You can also specify whether the content automatically continues on the next line when the end of the cell is reached. 水平对齐方式受属性，而属性控制的垂直对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is controlled by the property, while the property controls the vertical alignment. 属性指示是否禁用文本换行。The property indicates whether text wrapping is disabled. 通过使用或属性，可以控制的列或单元格占用的行数。By using the or the property, you can control the number of columns or rows that a cell occupies. 例如，可以创建通过设置表中占用两个列的单元格属性设置为`2`。For example, you can create a cell that occupies two columns in a table by setting the property to `2`. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用来修改表中单元格的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use an to modify the contents of a cell in a table. 请注意，的集合控件包含的行集合 (对象) 的表中。Note that the collection of an control contains a collection of the rows ( objects) in the table. 的集合对象是一系列单元格 (对象) 行中。The collection of an object is a collection of the cells ( objects) in a row. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCell/CS/htmltablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCell/VB/htmltablecellvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 此构造函数用于创建对象，表示``表数据单元格的元素。This constructor is used to create an object that represents the `` element for a table data cell. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Td"字符串。The "td" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例控件，其控制并将表放在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. 请注意如何控件的默认构造函数用于创建``元素，其采用字符串参数的重载构造函数使用文字字符串"th"来同时创建``元素。Note how the control's default constructor is used to create a `` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal string "th" to create a `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 用指定的标记名初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified tag name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 它允许您创建对象，表示中的单元格控件。It allows you to create an object that represents a cell in an control. 它通常用于创建对象，表示``表标题单元格的元素。It is commonly used to create an object that represents a `` element for a table heading cell. 虽然可以使用此构造函数来创建``元素对于表数据单元，您通常使用默认构造函数。Although you can use this constructor to create a `` element for a table data cell, you typically use the default constructor. > [!NOTE] > 尽管此构造函数允许您指定的单元格元素来创建，但``元素是唯一受支持的单元格元素。Although this constructor allows you to specify the cell element to create, the `` element is the only supported cell element. 对于将来的兼容性，此构造函数允许您创建可能还会提供其他 HTML 单元格元素。For future compatibility, this constructor allows you to create other HTML cell elements that could become available. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`tagName` 参数的值。The value of the `tagName` parameter.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建的实例控件，其控制并将表放在网页上。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of an control with controls and place the table on the Web page. 请注意如何控件的默认构造函数用于创建``元素，而其重载的构造函数采用字符串参数用于在带有文本"th"创建``元素。Note how the control's default constructor is used to create a `` element, while its overloaded constructor that takes a string parameter is used with the literal "th" to create a `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/CS/htmltablectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTableCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTableCtor/VB/htmltablectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格中内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 由 的实例表示的单元格中的内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: The horizontal alignment of the content in the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的单元格中内容的水平对齐方式类。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将影响的实例所表示的单元格仅类。Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the class. 若要将相同的对齐方式应用于表中的整个行的单元格，设置属性的实例所表示的行类。To apply the same alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the property of the row represented by an instance of the class. 下表列出了可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Left`|将单元格的左边缘与单元格的内容对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the left edge of the cell.| |`Center`|将在单元格中间单元格的内容对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell in the middle of the cell.| |`Right`|将单元格的右边缘与单元格的内容对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the right edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 此外可以使用`Justify`和`Char`作为此属性的值; 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持这些功能。You can also use `Justify` and `Char` as values for this property; however, not all browsers support these features. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的内容的对齐方式控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the alignment of the contents of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BgColor { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BgColor : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的背景色。

span.span: The background color of the cell represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的单元格的背景色类。Use the property to specify the background color of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 按名称或使用前导井号字符的十六进制值，可以指定一种颜色 (），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别指示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色成分的十六进制值。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它为红色和绿色组件中指定的最小值 (00) 而蓝色分量指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可用于属性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 网站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |浅绿色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |紫红色Fuchsia|# FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸橙色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |为褐红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海军Navy|#000080#000080| |橄榄色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |红色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |白色White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黄色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 与一起使用的可用颜色属性可确定从枚举。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的背景色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the background color of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色。

span.span: The border color of the cell represented by an instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的单元格的边框颜色类。Use the property to specify the border color of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 按名称或使用前导井号字符的十六进制值，可以指定一种颜色 (），在窗体 #RRGGBB 中。You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB. RR、 GG 和 BB 表示从 0 到 255 分别指示一种颜色，红色、 绿色和蓝色成分的十六进制值。RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively. 例如，值 # 0000ff> 表示的颜色为蓝色。For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue. 它为红色和绿色组件中指定的最小值 (00) 而蓝色分量指定的最大值 (FF)。It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component. 下表显示了十六个预定义的 HTML 颜色名称和相应的十六进制值，可用于属性。The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the property. HTML 颜色的详细信息，请参阅[World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) Web](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)站点。For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) site. |颜色名称Color name|十六进制值Hexadecimal value| |----------------|-----------------------| |浅绿色Aqua|#00FFFF#00FFFF| |黑色Black|#000000#000000| |蓝色Blue|#0000FF#0000FF| |紫红色Fuchsia|# FF00FF#FF00FF| |灰色Gray|#808080#808080| |绿色Green|#008000#008000| |酸橙色Lime|#00FF00#00FF00| |为褐红色Maroon|#800000#800000| |海军Navy|#000080#000080| |橄榄色Olive|#808000#808000| |紫色Purple|#800080#800080| |红色Red|#FF0000#FF0000| |SilverSilver|#C0C0C0#C0C0C0| |青色Teal|#008080#008080| |白色White|#FFFFFF#FFFFFF| |黄色Yellow|#FFFF00#FFFF00| 与一起使用的可用颜色属性可确定从枚举。The available colors for use with the property can be determined from the enumeration. 颜色名称不区分大小写。Color names are case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的边框颜色控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the border color of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ColSpan { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ColSpan : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格占用的列数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of columns occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格所占用的列数。

span.span: The number of columns occupied by the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的实例所表示的单元格类中，使用属性指定的单元格占用的列数。In a cell represented by an instance of the class, use the property to specify the number of columns the cell occupies. 这可以占用多个列在表中创建一个单元格。This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one column. 例如，假设有一个包含两个列和两个行的表。For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows. 您可以创建跨这两个列的表标题单元格。You can create a table heading cell that spans both columns. 设置属性中的第一行到的最左侧单元格`2`以指示该单元格占用表中的两个列。Set the property of the leftmost cell in the first row to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two columns in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 时跨列，请确保在所跨越的每个列的行定义一个更少的单元格。When spanning columns, be sure to define one fewer cell in the row for each column that you span. 例如，如果跨越两个列，则当前行中定义一个更少的单元格。For example, if you span two columns, define one fewer cell in the current row. 否则为该行将会超过表中的列数和表将不会按预期方式显示。Otherwise, that row will be longer than the number of columns in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的第一行中的单元格控件占用两个列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell in the first row of the control takes up two columns. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellColSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellColSpan/CS/htmltablecellcolspancs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellColSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellColSpan/VB/htmltablecellcolspanvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的高度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的单元格的高度 （以像素为单位）类。Use the property to specify the height (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 当指定单元格的高度时，同一行中的所有单元格将自动共享该高度。When you specify the height of a cell, all cells in the same row automatically share that height. > [!NOTE] > 如果你指定小于显示单元格的内容所需的高度，则忽略此属性。If you specify a height that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的高度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the height of the cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当到达单元格末尾时，由 类的实例所表示的单元格中的文本是否自动继续在下一行显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell.

value.span: 如果在单元格中文本不自动换行，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the text does not automatically wrap in the cell; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定是否在单元格中的文本实例所表示的类将自动继续在下一行上到达单元格末尾时。Use the property to specify or determine whether the text in a cell represented by an instance of the class automatically continues on the next line when it reaches the end of the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制文本的单元格中是否换行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control whether the text wraps in the cells of an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 呈现 控件的结束标记。

span.span: Renders the control's end tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了在调用基类的其他格式设置方法。The method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's method. 其他格式化将使控件呈现的 HTML 更易读的结束标记之后添加返回一行。The additional formatting makes the control's rendered HTML easier to read by adding a line return after the closing tag. 方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

value.span: 类的实例所表示的单元格占用的行数。

span.span: The number of rows occupied by a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的实例所表示的单元格类中，使用属性指定的单元格占用的行数。In a cell represented by an instance of the class, use the property to specify the number of rows the cell occupies. 这可以占用多个行在表中创建一个单元格。This allows you to create a cell in the table that occupies more than one row. 例如，假设有一个包含两个列和两个行的表。For example, suppose you have a table that contains two columns and two rows. 可以创建重叠两个行的列。You can create a column that overlaps both rows. 设置属性中的第一列的最左侧单元格`2`以指示该单元格占用两个表中的行。Set the property of the leftmost cell in the first column to `2` to indicate that this cell takes up two rows in the table. > [!CAUTION] > 跨越行时，请确保所跨越的每一行的列中定义一个更少的单元格。When spanning rows, be sure to define one fewer cell in the column for each row that you span. 例如，如果跨越两行，则该列中定义一个更少的单元格。For example, if you span two rows, define one fewer cell in that column. 否则为该列将会超过表中的行数和表将不会按预期方式显示。Otherwise, that column will be longer than the number of rows in the table and the table will not be displayed as expected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性指定的第一列中的单元格控件跨越两行。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the cell in the first column of the control spans two rows. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellRowSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellRowSpan/CS/htmltablecellrowspancs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellRowSpan#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellRowSpan/VB/htmltablecellrowspanvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VAlign { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VAlign : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: The vertical alignment for the content of a cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的单元格中内容的垂直对齐方式类。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the content in a cell represented by an instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性将影响的实例所表示的单元格仅类。Setting this property affects only the cell represented by an instance of the class. 若要将相同的垂直对齐方式应用于表中的整个行的单元格，设置属性的实例所表示的行类。To apply the same vertical alignment to the cells of an entire row in the table, set the property of the row represented by an instance of the class. 下表列出了可用于此属性的值。The following table lists the values that can be used for this property. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`Top`|将单元格的上边缘与单元格的内容对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the upper edge of the cell.| |`Middle`|对齐单元格的中心中的单元格的内容。Aligns the contents of a cell in the center of the cell.| |`Bottom`|将单元格的下边缘与单元格的内容对齐。Aligns the contents of a cell with the lower edge of the cell.| > [!NOTE] > 此外可以使用`BaseLine`作为此属性的值。You can also use `BaseLine` as a value for this property. 但是，并非所有浏览器都支持此功能。However, not all browsers support this feature. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的内容的垂直对齐方式控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the vertical alignment of the contents of the cells in an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/CS/htmltablecellbehaviorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellBehavior#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellBehavior/VB/htmltablecellbehaviorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Width { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Width : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置由 类的实例所表示的单元格的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class.

value.span: 的实例所表示的单元格的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的实例所表示的单元格的宽度 （以像素为单位）类。Use the property to specify the width (in pixels) of the cell represented by an instance of the class. 当指定的单元格的宽度时，同一列中的所有单元格将自动共享该宽度。When you specify the width for a cell, all cells in the same column automatically share that width. > [!NOTE] > 如果指定小于显示单元格的内容所需的宽度，则忽略此属性。If you specify a width that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the cell, this property is ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式控制中的单元格的宽度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically control the width of the cells in the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/CS/htmltablecellappearancecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTblCellAppearance#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTblCellAppearance/VB/htmltablecellappearancevb.aspx#1)]
